name: Rust red recycled wool felt and tan leather dilly bag.
description:
Cylindrical felt bag with tan textured leather drawstring handles, base and side panel. 
The advantage of a drawstring is it can be used as 2 short handles or one shoulder length handle.  
The semi- circular shaped flap over the opening is held in place by an antique tan button.
The external pocket is an integral part of the design and reflects the origin of the felted garment. This adds elegance to the quirky off centre bag.

Dimensions
27 cm (depth )
50 cm (circumference )
19 cm x 9 cm ( oval base )

Materials:  Recycled wool felt and tan textured leather. 
Quantity:  1 only

name: Green zip collared recycled sweater style hand bag.
description:
Rich warm green bag with earth colored wide striped detail in the handle gusset and pocket. Colors include dull dark blue, yellow ochre, tan and  black.The handle is double thickness felt and 6 cm wide which makes it a comfortable fit on the shoulder.
A funky floating side pocket creates easy access to a mobile phone. 
The zippered front collar is reminiscent of the origins of the bag.

Dimensions
34 cm (depth )
35 cm (width)
10 cm x 34 cm (base gusset )
74 cm (handle)

Material: Recycled wool felt.
Quantity: 1 only.

name: Black recycled wool felt laptop bag.
description:
The thick felt bag is a simple rectangular shape with a gusseted base.
It is designed to carry folders magazines and/ or a laptop.
A double felted handle encourages comfort on the shoulder. 
It features a deep phone pocket at the top in a sage green with internal detail in red. A small buttoned placket allows for extending the pocket opening.
    
Dimensions
42 cm (depth )
33 cm (width )
12 cm (gusset width )
72.cm (handle )

Material: Recycled wool felt.
Quantity: 1 only.

name: Multicolored recycled felted wool shoulder pod bag.
description:
Funky and functional cylindrical shaped bag.
The product is reversible, has a pocket suitable for a large mobile phone and a comfortable soft black leather handle.
The main color is elephant (grey brown ) The vertical 
stripes are bright featuring royal blue, teal, cerise, red, purple, orange and light green. On one side the fabric and stripes are smooth while the other is detailed with ridged seams and a rougher texture on the surface.
Red is also used in the circular base and as piping on a side seam.

Dimensions
32 cm  ( depth )
58 cm  ( top .. circumference of opening )
10 cm  ( base.. diameter )
96 cm  (handle length )

Materials : Recycled wool felt and leather.
Quantity : 1 only.

name: Dark grey recycled wool felt shopping shoulder bag.
description:
Rectangular finely patterned 2 toned grey shoulder bag with black leather external pocket, base and handle grips.
Heavy duty felt produced from recycled woolen garment.
Features metal buckle on flap.
 
Dimensions
Size 33 cm  ( internal depth )
       35 cm  (width )
       27 cm x 11.5 cm  (oval base ) 

Materials : Recycled wool felt and leather.
Quantity :  1 only.
